sentences.english: We will strengthen inspection and oversight of policy implementation and ensure that all orders are carried out and all prohibitions are observed.
sentences.chinese: 加強對政策執行情況的檢查監督，做到令行禁止。

sentences.english: The government should execute orders and proclaim prohibitions to those practicing corruption.
sentences.chinese: 對這些腐敗行爲政府一定要令行禁止。

sentences.english: The capable and high efficiency project management department will be organized to ensure the immediate execution of instructions from the Owner.
sentences.chinese: 組成精幹高效的項目班子，確保指令暢通，令行禁止。
